cluster_relations.rel_desc: Urban legends often include stories centered on haunted houses.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeRole: typical setting/location in such legends

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Urban legends frequently feature ghostly apparitions as central elements.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeRole: typical supernatural entity in such legends

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Urban legends include stories about mysterious creatures.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeRole: central beings in such legends

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a narrative type or tradition commonly includes a given motif, setting, or supernatural element as part of its typical content.
args.justification: All three relations link the category 'urban legends' to recurring narrative elements (haunted houses, ghostly apparitions, mysterious creatures), describing typical content motifs rather than hierarchical or causal links. A unified predicate 'features_motif' best captures that the subject narrative tradition commonly includes the object as a motif.
args.remark: Used for narrative-content composition: subject is a legend/genre/tradition; object is a recurring motif, setting, or entity.

args.justification: Each relation expresses that a narrative tradition (urban legends) is associated with specific recurring motifs or elements. Grouping them under 'narrative_motif_relation' captures this family of relations across different narrative domains.
These relations describe what narrative content urban legends are composed of (their typical motifs and elements), which fits best under a broad composition/content-structure dimension.
